subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The National Football League will lend $300 million to the Jets and the Giants to underwrite the construction of their new stadium in the Meadowlands that is expected to open for the 2010 season.
snippet: The National Football League will lend $300 million to the Jets and the Giants to underwrite the construction of their new stadium in the Meadowlands that is expected to open for the 2010 season.
